channel.title: [Help] Adding Fletching Exp?
channel.description:
im trying to fix my skills, I have my fletching worked out but when i fletch the logs it dosnt give me xp, i can only fletch arrow shafts atm and they dont give xp. Its really basic i know but where exactly Would i add the xp and how Because theres so many options with fletching.
Ive tried c.getPA().addSkillXP((ITEM_ON_ITEM[j][3] * xp) * FLETCHING_XP, c.playerFletching); and manouvering that didnt even work. Can somene please help?

item.title: [Help] Adding Fletching Exp?
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“gimpie, post:1, topic:536745”]im trying to fix my skills, I have my fletching worked out but when i fletch the logs it dosnt give me xp, i can only fletch arrow shafts atm and they dont give xp. Its really basic i know but where exactly Would i add the xp and how Because theres so many options with fletching.

Ive tried c.getPA().addSkillXP((ITEM_ON_ITEM[j][3] * xp) * FLETCHING_XP, c.playerFletching); and manouvering that didnt even work. Can somene please help?[/quote]
Your best try would be to add it after the items are made. So the logs get deleted and the arrow shafts replace it. I think that would be your best option.

Read full topic
